rules.title: Patient Type Inquiry
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new or established patient?

rules.title: Dental Insurance Status for New Patients
rules.condition: The patient is identified as new.
rules.action: Ask if they have dental insurance.

rules.title: Insurance Provider Name Inquiry
rules.condition: The patient confirms having dental insurance.
rules.action: Ask for the name of their insurance provider.
rules.example: What is the name of your dental insurance company?

rules.title: Insurance Plan Type Inquiry
rules.condition: The agent has received the insurance provider's name.
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (e.g., PPO/HMO).
rules.example: Is your plan a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Primary Insurance Holder Inquiry
rules.condition: The agent has received the insurance plan type.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is the primary holder of the insurance.
rules.example: Are you the primary holder of this insurance policy?

rules.title: Out-of-Network Notification
rules.condition: The patient's insurance is determined to be out of network.
rules.action: Inform the customer about the out-of-network status.
rules.example: It appears your insurance is out of our network.

rules.title: Clarification Request Handling
rules.action: Repeat the last question or statement.
rules.example: Customer: 'Can you repeat that?' Agent: 'Certainly, I asked, 'What is the name of your dental insurance company?'

rules.title: Information Acknowledgement
rules.example: Customer: 'My plan is a PPO.' Agent: 'Thank you, a PPO plan.'
